title: Do Justice: Practical Ways to Engage Our World
description: Justice cries out for action—from you—today.Social justice is no longer a hidden topic. Christians now understand that it is indeed biblical. But it may not look the way you think; it may not sound the way you’ve been told. Do Justice is a hands-on-guide that will allow you to dive in and discover what you can do now in your corner of the world. Hear the stories of brave men and women who have gone before, and be inspired by the work of others as you make your own action plan. After all, God doesn’t expect you to do everything, but he does ask you to do something. What is your something?
author: Kristi Burton Brown
